thread.section_title: Mantel Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van Mantel | www.mantel.com | 47 van 816
thread.title: Dominic shepherd

author: Dominic shepherd
title: Dominic shepherd
text:
Brakes arrived really quickly considering they came from outside the UK. Fitting was straight forward. They seemed and felt better made. Anyway I have been out for a couple of rides and I don't seem to get any problems, it did with the Giant ti sl. Braking feels a lot tighter and more solid.
The adjustment screw is at a slight angle to adjust compared with the Giant but who cares as they don't really need continuous fettling so no real problem.
Some people commented that they are expensive but I think they are pretty cheap considering the options. I have my brakes fitted to a propel SL with dura ace so I think if I had to buy a set of dura ace brakes they would have cost me a lot more.
So overall I am very pleased with the brakes and Mantel for there 1st class service.
